Package game.controllers

Class CombatMaker

java.lang.Object
game.controllers.CombatMaker
public class CombatMaker extends Object
CombatMaker class initialises the starting class, hp and weapon of the actor.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Chew Xin Ning 32693974
